member.name: T:Tizen.System.PowerUsage
member.summary: Provides information related to the power consumption by applications or by hardware resources on a battery-powered device for a given duration of time.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.PowerUsage.GetPowerUsage(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Tizen.System.PowerUsageResourceType},System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the battery consumption in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) for the resources specified by the application in custom interval.
member.param: Application ID of the application for which battery usage is required.
list of resource type identifiers like BLE, WiFi, CPU etc.
Start Time for data in DateTime.
End Time for data in DateTime.
member.returns: Returns the battery consumption in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) for the resources specified by the application in custom interval.
member.exception: When an invalid parameter value is set.
If the privilege is not set.
In case of any system error.
In case power usage is not supported

member.name: M:Tizen.System.PowerUsage.GetPowerUsage(System.String,Tizen.System.PowerUsageResourceType,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the battery consumption in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) for the specific resource for the given application in custom interval.
member.param: Application ID of the application for which battery usage is required.
Identifier of resource type. BLE, WiFi, CPU etc.
Start Time for data in DateTime.
End Time for data in DateTime.
member.returns: Returns the battery consumption in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) for the specific resource for the given application in custom interval.
member.exception: When an invalid parameter value is set.
If the privilege is not set.
In case of any system error.
In case power usage is not supported

member.name: M:Tizen.System.PowerUsage.GetPowerUsage(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the total battery usage in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) by an application for certain time interval.
member.param: Application ID of the application for which battery usage is required.
Start Time for data in DateTime.
End Time for data in DateTime.
member.returns: Returns the total battery usage in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) by an application for certain time interval.
member.exception: When an invalid parameter value is set.
If the privilege is not set.
In case of any system error.
In case power usage is not supported

member.name: M:Tizen.System.PowerUsage.GetPowerUsage(Tizen.System.PowerUsageResourceType,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the battery usage in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) by a resource for certain time interval.
member.param: Identifier of resource type. BLE, WiFi, CPU etc.
Start Time for data in DateTime.
End Time for data in DateTime.
member.returns: Returns the battery usage in mAh(milli-Ampere hour) by a resource for certain time interval.
member.exception: When an invalid parameter value is set.
If the privilege is not set.
In case of any system error.
In case power usage is not supported
